text: But if it fails to modify that plan Rhodesia may well be plunged into chaos, like the Congo. For Mr. Macmillan and his ministers there is no choice. They must safeguard grow the fastest? That is the exciting competition going on among Britain's major industries.
handwritten_text: But if it fails to modify that plan Rhodesia may well be plunged into chaos, like the Congo. For Mr. Macmillan and his ministers there is no choice. They must safeguard grow the fastest? That is the exciting competition going on among Britain's major industries.
